des: "This is a really easy recipe.  Also works great with nonfat sweetened condensed milk and a reduced fat pie crust.  Great topped with whipped topping or baked meringue. A baked pie shell may be used instead of graham cracker crust."
ins:
Whisk the egg yolks into the milk.   Stir in lime juice until well combined.  Pour filling into graham cracker crust.
Refrigerate for 2 hours if made without egg yolks, 4 hours or overnight with egg yolks.
